display.title: Creating a End Spawner
display.description: An End Spawner Structure Kit can be made by dropping a Stone Saw & Hammer, a stack of Purpur Blocks, Beacon, & Sea Lantern onto a Fletching Table [Required: 1x Stone Saw & Hammer 64x Purpur Blocks 1x Beacon 1x Sea Lantern | Drop Craft With: Fletching Table]
